about.title: About **Me**
about.subtitle: Get to know me through *code*
about.storyParagraph1: I'm a **developer** with over *20 years* of professional experience, but the story started much earlier — I was around 8 or 9 when I wrote my first lines of code. I focus on **web development**, with a strong love for **frontend** — where code meets design and user experience. I can handle backend too, but I feel at home making interfaces that connect with people.
about.storyParagraph2: I also have a background in **graphic design**, which sharpened my visual sense and communication skills. I'm **self‑taught** and *endlessly curious*, the kind of person who learns by exploring, breaking things, and fixing them better. I genuinely love *technology* — I can spend hours coding, experimenting, and building new ideas.
about.storyParagraph3: Born in **1980**, I've witnessed the evolution of computing from the pre‑PC days to today's *AI‑driven* world. Off‑screen, I'm happily in a relationship and a father of two amazing young adults.
about.storySummary: In short: a lifelong learner who codes with **purpose**, designs with *intent*, and never stops being **curious**.

webApps.title: **Full-Stack** Web Applications
webApps.description: Complete web applications with modern technologies, from frontend to backend and database integration.
webApps.descriptionExpanded: I build end-to-end web applications tailored to your specific business needs. From database design to user interface, every component is crafted with attention to detail, security, and performance. Whether you need a customer portal, internal tool, or SaaS platform, I deliver scalable solutions that grow with your business.

faqs.question: How long does a typical web app take to build?
faqs.answer: Development time varies based on complexity. A small application typically takes 4-6 weeks, medium projects 6-10 weeks, and large-scale applications 10-16 weeks from initial consultation to deployment.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: I use modern, proven technologies including **React**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **PostgreSQL**, and **AWS/Vercel** for hosting. The specific stack is chosen based on your project requirements and scalability needs.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
faqs.answer: Yes! I offer maintenance packages that include bug fixes, security updates, feature enhancements, and technical support. We can discuss the best support plan for your needs during our consultation.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. I have experience integrating with various third-party services, APIs, and legacy systems. Whether it's CRM, payment processors, or custom databases, I can build seamless connections.

faqs.question: What's included in the project cost?
faqs.answer: Project cost includes planning, design, development, testing, deployment, and initial training. Ongoing hosting, domain registration, and third-party service fees are separate.

meta.title: Full-Stack Web Application Development | Custom Solutions
meta.description: Professional full-stack web application development services. From concept to deployment, I build scalable, secure web apps tailored to your business needs.

landingPages.title: **Landing Pages** & Static Sites
landingPages.description: High-converting landing pages and blazing-fast static websites optimized for performance and SEO.
landingPages.descriptionExpanded: Stand out with lightning-fast landing pages designed to convert visitors into customers. Built with modern static site generators, your pages load instantly, rank higher in search results, and provide exceptional user experiences across all devices. Perfect for product launches, marketing campaigns, and business websites.

faqs.question: What's the difference between a landing page and a website?
faqs.answer: A landing page is a single, focused page designed for a specific goal (e.g., capturing leads, promoting a product). A website has multiple pages with broader information. Both can be built as static sites for optimal performance.

faqs.question: How fast will my site load?
faqs.answer: Static sites typically achieve **Lighthouse scores of 95+** with load times under 1 second. This is significantly faster than traditional WordPress or database-driven sites, improving both user experience and SEO.

faqs.question: Can I update the content myself?
faqs.answer: Yes! I can integrate headless CMS solutions like **Contentful**, **Sanity**, or **Strapi** that allow you to update content through a user-friendly interface without coding knowledge.

faqs.question: Will my site work on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All sites are built with a **mobile-first** approach, ensuring perfect display and functionality on smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Responsive design is standard, not an add-on.

faqs.question: Do you provide hosting?
faqs.answer: I recommend and can set up hosting on platforms like **Vercel** or **Netlify**, which offer free tiers, automatic deployments, and excellent performance. Hosting setup and first-year costs are included in the project.

meta.title: Landing Page & Static Website Development | High-Performance Sites
meta.description: Professional landing pages and static websites that load instantly and convert visitors. Optimized for SEO, mobile-friendly, and built with modern technologies.

automation.title: **Automation** & Integrations
automation.description: Streamline your workflows with custom automations and seamless third-party integrations.
automation.descriptionExpanded: Save time and reduce errors with custom automation solutions. From simple data sync to complex workflow automation, I build integrations that connect your tools and eliminate repetitive tasks. Whether connecting your CRM to your marketing platform or automating data processing, I create reliable systems that work 24/7.

breakdown: **Multiple integrations**: Custom quote based on complexity

faqs.question: What tools can you integrate?
faqs.answer: I can integrate virtually any tool with an API including **CRMs** (Salesforce, HubSpot), **project management** (Asana, Jira), **e-commerce** (Shopify, WooCommerce), **marketing** (Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign), and many more.

faqs.question: How reliable are automated workflows?
faqs.answer: Automated workflows include error handling, retry logic, and monitoring to ensure reliability. I implement logging and alerts to quickly identify and resolve any issues that may arise.

faqs.question: Can you automate our existing manual processes?
faqs.answer: Yes! I specialize in analyzing manual workflows and building automation solutions. We'll identify bottlenecks, map out the process, and create automations that save you hours every week.

faqs.question: What if an integrated service changes its API?
faqs.answer: I build integrations with versioning and error handling to minimize disruption. I also offer maintenance packages that include monitoring for API changes and updates to keep your integrations running smoothly.

faqs.question: How long does it take to set up an integration?
faqs.answer: Simple integrations can be set up in 1-2 weeks. Complex multi-system workflows may take 3-6 weeks depending on requirements, testing needs, and data migration.

meta.title: Workflow Automation & API Integration Services | Custom Solutions
meta.description: Professional workflow automation and API integration services. Connect your tools, eliminate repetitive tasks, and streamline your business processes.

socialDesign.title: **Social Media** Design
socialDesign.description: Compelling visual content and brand assets designed to engage your audience across social platforms.
socialDesign.descriptionExpanded: Build a cohesive and engaging social media presence with professional design assets. From Instagram posts to LinkedIn banners, I create visually stunning content that aligns with your brand identity and captures attention in crowded feeds. Get ready-to-use templates that make consistent posting effortless.

faqs.question: What platforms do you design for?
faqs.answer: I create designs optimized for all major platforms including **Instagram**, **Facebook**, **LinkedIn**, **Twitter/X**, **Pinterest**, and **TikTok**. Each design is sized and formatted specifically for the platform's requirements.

faqs.question: Will I be able to edit the templates?
faqs.answer: Yes! Templates are delivered in **Figma** and **Canva** formats, making them easy to customize. I also provide a quick guide on how to update text, colors, and images to maintain your brand consistency.

faqs.question: Do you create the actual social media content?
faqs.answer: I design the visual templates and brand assets. Content writing, photography, and ongoing posting are separate services. However, I can recommend trusted partners for content creation if needed.

faqs.question: How long does it take to create a template pack?
faqs.answer: A basic package typically takes 1-2 weeks, standard packages 2-3 weeks, and premium packages with full branding 3-4 weeks. This includes initial designs, your review, and revisions.

faqs.question: Can you match my existing brand?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I'll work with your existing brand guidelines, colors, fonts, and style. If you don't have formal guidelines, I can create them based on your current materials and preferences.

meta.title: Social Media Design Services | Templates & Brand Assets
meta.description: Professional social media design services. Custom templates, brand identity, and visual content that engages your audience across all platforms.
